quoteText: Spotify may terminate the Agreements or suspend your access to the Spotify Service at any time, including in the event of your actual or suspected unauthorized use of the Spotify Service and/or Content, or non-compliance with the Agreements
title: Spotify can delete your account without telling you

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
tosdr.tldr: Spotify can close your account without notice, without refund, for any or no reason.
